item.title: Matthias Elgeti
item.description: Matthias is currently a Research Scientist at UCLA. He completed his PhD in Biophysics at the Humboldt Universit√§t zu Berlin under the supervision of Drs. Franz Bartl and Klaus Peter Hofmann. He then completed postdoctoral training at UCLA, under the supervision of Dr. Wayne Hubbell. In Spring 2023, Matthias will join the Institute for Drug Discovery and Institute for Medical Physics and Biophysics at the University of Leipzig as a Research Group Leader.
